Test.name: Test split-container basic
Test.WhatTest: Test the creation of a basic split-container.
Test.HowWorkTest: A new split-container is started and the AMS is asked to start a new agent (ping agent).
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if: 1. the agent is successfully created and replies to messages 2. the agent is successfully killed 3. the split-container is successfully killed.

Test.name: Bootstrap Wildcard agent creation on basic split-container.
Test.WhatTest: Test the usage of wildcards in agent names when starting an agent at split-container bootstrap
Test.HowWorkTest: A new split-container is started specifying on the command line an agent including the #C wildcard in its name
Test.WhenTestPass: The test passes if an agent is created with the expected name (i.e. with the #C wildcard substituted with the container name)
